lead_paragraph: Kay Yow, the North Carolina State women’s coach, said yesterday at the Atlantic Coast Conference news media day that she had resumed chemotherapy for treatment of breast cancer. Yow, 65, had stopped chemotherapy during the off-season.Yow’s cancer was first diagnosed in 1987; it recurred during the 2004-5 season. Treatments forced her to miss 16 games last season, but she returned to lead the Wolfpack to the Round of 16 in the N.C.A.A. tournament.
